title: Having issues Patching 6.20? Click Here
body:
Hey all,

Damn, Worlds has been pretty crazy so far.  Patch 6.20 is gonna be just as crazy as sightings of multi-colored streaks have been reported falling from the sky. The newest additions to the Star Guardian team have arrived! ...Sorry Urgot

http://i.imgur.com/1dTPYE3.png

We want to make sure you're able to log in and join the fun! Read through this post then give us a shot out below. We'll be happy to help!
----------------------------------------------

>#***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

>#***Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!

>#***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body: Unspecified Error has occurred is my problem. I try to fix it in any way.Was useless. Please try to help me soon
ME too
same PLZ HELP RIOT :(((((
me toooo ><
got the same problem no way to fix ppl say delete avg but i dont even have avg program :)
Please try to fix it Riot, I got the same problem :(
It updated for me just fine, but my chat services wont work. Keeps logging me out of it, cant access friends list or anything. Please help.

I  can log in, but am not able to get into game, instant crash.
Giving me a leavebuster ... this kind of sucks , you know ?
What kind of crash error are you seeing? Is this a bugsplat message or something else? A little more information will help me give you a better answer. :)

Hey LunaFox I am getting the bugsplat message when the crash happens. and the crash always happens right as I'm about to enter the game after champ select is complete. I have a support ticket already if you want to look at the information I provided in it. Just let me know I'll get the ticket number for you.
I'm getting the same issue. Do you have to force shut down your computer??
same here

Hey CrisesX!

What kind of crash error are you seeing, and is it occurring in game as well- or did it pop up elsewhere? Let me know!

Keep getting unspecified error and there's nothing I can do to improve my connection. I doubt it's actually my connection since I have downloaded every patch aside from this one without any issues at all.
At what percentage did you get stuck at on the patcher? Depending on how far it gets, the solution can be different. Let me know!
1 file scanned 33% and it dont work for an houre now :((((
SAME
mine says 0 files scanned :( been messing with it for an hour as well.
im having the same issue, its scattered percentage when you get stuck... uninstalling and reinstalling isnt doing anything.
I get to 99% and then the "unspecified error" comes up, sometimes 91 or 94%. Gone through every guide i have found and nothing helps. Been like this for 5 days now and i really want to play!!!
Same.  Unspecified error at 33%.  Calculating differences, 0 files scanned. Internet connection is great.  Restart did not work.

I was able to get the 6.20 patch with Ivern just fine, but today when I try and open League it's trying to calculate differences again stuck at 33% and 1 file before giving me an "Unspecified Error has occurred" message. I have tried the repair tool and reinstalling, turning off firewall, wired and wireless.
I believe there was a Patch today on 10/08/2016 , that is not allowing me or 5 of my friends to update.
Still have the unspecified error problem, have reinstalled and followed all the guides. still gets stuck at 33%

I haven't been able to play the game all day because my patcher isn't working. Don't know what else to do.

I submitted a ticket 18 hours ago and have yet to get a response.
I did the repair tool and that didn't work.
I downloaded hextech repair tool and my computer won't even let me use it.
I even uninstalled 2 times the game and on reinstalling it I got the same error again.
I looked at internet for solutions noone worked.
I looked at youtube for solutions noone worked. 
It get stucked at 33% and I get Unspeficied Error has occured.
Ive never got any problems at patching before

This sounds like you might have something like a setting or program preventing LoL or other programs from running as a protective measure; note how you can't use the HRT either.

That's ok; we have something that should be able to help! [Try running through our Permissions Troubleshooting Guide here](http://riot.com/1SB1JXQ) and that will make sure there's nothing blocking LoL. [You can also try and run through our Connections Guide](http://riot.com/12B7oac); a lot of the times getting stuck after 33% is a sign of an unstable connection. Try these out, let me know if they help. :)

It's definitely not something with us this time, guys. When I fix it by switching regions after using HRT and launching LoL as an admin, it installs the patch for a few minutes but then the problem would appear again.

I noticed during patching that everything was downloading much slower than usual, but eventually the patch finished, and I logged in to the client. However, when I closed the client and then tried to open it less than a minute later, it started scanning files and got stuck at 33% before giving me an unspecified error.

I went through the Connection Issues Guide, none of them resolving the problem, so I assumed the game files are corrupted, so I started running a repair and the download speed is just as painfully slow as before, going at 1/10th of my connection's bandwidth at best.

I was hoping to have league updated for my club meeting tonight, but downloading 3Gb at 100Kbps will take over 80 hours. RIP

Hello, I am having an issue with league crashing/ freezing my laptop once my champ gets into game.

When I get into a match, it freezes the game instantly or within a few seconds. I then have to force shut down my computer and turn it back on and then I can get back into the game without it crashing (most of the time). I Repaired league but that didn't help. I have uninstalled and CC cleaned my laptop (PC). I also checked for updates and also cleared my cache and cookies on chome (didnt think this would help but tried it anyway). Reinstalled it again but didn't seem to fix it. I played a custom game with a friend and the first one went fine but the second game we played crashed instantly. I also had to start opening league as an Administrator which never happened until this recent patch. Than you for the help.

Hey there, I'm running through ethernet on a very good connection (never have any connection problems at all) and I also don't have any antivirus installed other than MalwareBytes but it's not even enabled, or on for that matter. My first try I got to 75% installed or so when it did the unspecified error popup, the second time it just did it after like 20 seconds. Again, my connection is flawless.

I'm in a current game where I can't even connect and right after match making the reconnect sign keeps popping up. This happened to me my last game and I got a leaver buster and I don't understand what can I do if my game keeps getting disconnected directly after champ select finishes. HELP PLEASE

i am not getting any ip

Does anyone know anyway to get past and launch? I basically temporary fixed it by retrying it countless times and it worked but the next day when I logged on I kept getting crash error along the lines of "failed to launch application" or something. Repaired the client and reinstalled now back at step 1, u specified error first at 99% then at 33-34% with 2 files scanned. Someone said just hit the x and let the client gonna try this and will let know if it fixes my issue. (Riot please look into this issue it's not on our end if many people are having this problem).

Unspecified Error has occurred here... i tryied everything. from run as admin to unistalling and installing it again. its just stop's at random %. Is it internet or something else? when i run hextech repair everything looks fine. Dunno what to do anymore:(
my problem is looks like code. nothing i can do to fix it. i checked my logs. my patch keeps retrying to patch. and i ve done everything on your list of things to do
Foe unspecified error, delete lolairclient in RADS/projects/ folder, then restart league. Should repatch and run smoothly from there. Worked for me :)
Idk why dut i played this morning but i cant antmore
I already updated my league and was playing it earlier today, but now I am stuck at the 33% saying only 1 file is scanned then gives me an error.

HI, 
I'm having performance issues. Before this patch I was running at 120fps locked at Very High Quality. Now I am running anywhere in Between 20Fps a 60fps. Doesn't matter if I am in aram or Summoners Rift. I have repaired the client, re-installed the client, updated my drivers, and even formatted my PC, there was no improvement in performance. What more shall I do?
Thanks

i keep getting unexpected errors, i tried uninstalling and reinstalling i tried deleting files from folder, i tried repair button 4 times and it still gets stuck at 99% saying error, can someone please help, this is getting ridiculous now.

_**Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message**_
I had that msg I tryed everything and when I uninstalled AVG free antivirus, I restarted pc and League of legends  worked fine. Downloaded the patch and Im playing right now
sorry for my bad English I hope it helped
Looks like Riot are fully aware but not doing anything atm. Unfortunate
what i mean it's i can't logging on : " enter password and username it crashed just after that

i was playing all normal all day then was changing accounts now its stuck in a bloody loop and cannot PATCH!!! just keeps giving an error saying "UNSPECIFIED error check files" or some nonsense like that wth man i was playing all fine and thing and then i go to relogg its patching again now stuck and cant even patch to get in -_-
Just to make sure, you're seeing the unspecified error during the patching process? If so- let me know how far in percentage the patcher is making and I can give you some solutions for that! :)

OK! so i got it to work........wat i did was reinstall the game then i reinstalled it to where the game required to be installed, then i ran a drive restore as in the drive c repair thing told it to run scan and try repair wen u start up computer seems to have done the trick..hope this helps anyone else who has the problem

EDIT!! it works and once i closed the client it came back..............COME ON RIOT this CANNOT be my comp now its something with ur shit geezus so ur telling me i cant close  the dam game or its back to that error bs again......
....
OK last edit it does work MAKE SURE U DELETE THE BUGGED EXE. SHORTCUTS OR WATEVER thats y i thought the problem came back use the newly installed exe points or it will go back in the error patcher

It stops at 33% everytime even tried to reinstall and yes during the patching process...thing is i alrdy updated in the day logged out went back to play again started patching again and then that unspecified error crap pops up....sent a ticket with logs from the fixer things still waiting on response...i duno wat else  to do so yea

Hey guys this isn't specifically with this patch only, but with most recent patches, during the patch my computer almost totally freezes up, becomes unresponsive often, and essentially is unusable until patching completes.  The patch also take a lot longer then it used to, like up to an hour, to complete.  This doesn't seem normal so i figured i would see whats up(if anything).
